The Blue Light Cystoscopy Cysview Registry web-based program support Global Vision Technologies . Data capture longitudinally two ( 2 ) year patient enrol site . Each center enter respective site 's patient data electronically .
DOC.criteria: Adult > 18 year old Suspected known nonmuscle invasive bladder cancer basis prior cystoscopy Porphyria Gross hematuria Known hypersensitivity hexaminolevulinate aminolevulinate derivative
